template.p: THE UNDERSIGNED agrees to a Transfer of Title of ‘The Inventory’ (see Appendix A), and agree to certain undertakings in connection with the transfer of the property, as provided below:

p.span: 1. ‘The Donor’, which holds title, custody and control of The Inventory, agrees that it will transfer all right, title and interest in The Inventory, and physical possession thereof, to (“The Beneficiary”), which agrees to accept such transfer of the property. The full inventory is validated as set forth on the date of delivery and is to be confirmed after completion of delivery.

2. The Beneficiary agrees that upon delivery all right, title and interest accorded to The Inventory should be removed from The Donor in its entirety. The Beneficiary will take on all right, title, and interest in The Inventory for the purposes of benefiting the ongoing work of The Beneficiary according to its stated aims and purposes. The Beneficiary agrees that The Donor shall be fully indemnified and protected from any subsequent usage of The Inventory and held harmless in the event of any claims arising from such usage.

3. The Beneficiary gives Green Standards Ltd. (“GSL”) official permission and authority to; employ any images and written content collected/provided during the project in reporting solutions; feature reporting solutions on company website; in some instances, release to external media outlets; use organization name, trade names and trademarks. GSL will own all rights and interests in the reporting, the photographs, and copy associated with the reporting except with respect to the intellectual property rights of The Beneficiary (trade names, trademarks, logos, etc.) which The Beneficiary gives GSL an irrevocable license to use in conjunction with the reporting of this project only.
N WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto each acting with proper authority have executed this agreement.

ol.li: Beneficiary understands that the purpose of this document is to confirm the beneficiary’s commitment to receive their requested inventory but does not convey a commitment on the part of Green Standards (GSL) or its client to execute the donation.
Beneficiary understands that delivery of assets will consist of a tailgate offload only and no labour will be provided for installation or to transport assets into the Beneficiary’s facility.
Beneficiary agrees to provide reporting in the form of: Transfer of Title and Donation Testimonial, such as photos and a written testimonial (provided by Beneficiary).
Beneficiary understands its obligation to provide a number of able-bodied staff or volunteers (“volunteers”) to provide all labour once items have been offloaded from vehicle.

Beneficiary understands its obligation to make sure volunteers are equipped with appropriate safety gear and equipment, including, but not limited to, gloves, appropriate footwear, dollies for transporting heavier items, etc. Beneficiary understands that it is its sole responsibility to ensure a safe environment for its volunteers.
These volunteers must remain on site for the duration of the delivery period.

Beneficiary understands that all systems furniture and many larger items may be partly or wholly dismantled for transportation; any installation or re-assembly is the responsibility of the beneficiary. GSL is able to provide contact information for resources to facilitate this process.
Beneficiary understands that all assets are used and will arrive in “as is” condition. Specifically, color and finish may vary from photo-documented inventory.

Beneficiary agrees to receive all inventory items it has requested, as long as those items don’t prove to be grossly damaged in non-working condition or not in Appendix A. Any items that are delivered in non-satisfactory condition must not stay on your property and leave with the logistics provider on the same day. Acceptance of these items is your acknowledgement of transfer of ownership.
Beneficiary agrees to communicate to GSL discrepancies or deficiencies in the inventory at the time of delivery, preferably with photo evidence emailed to the GSL project manager.
Item counts are subject to availability and may decrease without notice. GSL agrees to not send additional inventories without prior approval from Beneficiary.

Beneficiary acknowledges that the property being transferred to it has been previously used, that it has had ample opportunity to inspect the property, and, it is accepting title on an ‘as is’ basis. The Corporate Donor and GSL make no representations with respect to the quality of the property or its fitness for any purpose. Beneficiary specifically agrees that, in consideration of receipt of the property, it will not make any claim (in negligence or otherwise) against the Corporate Donor and GSL with respect to the property or its use.

template.p: This Personal Property Agreement (the “Agreement”) for the transfer of personal property is effective as of ________________ (the “Effective Date”), between Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. (“Donor”), and ___________________________________ (“Beneficiary”). Beneficiary and Donor may be referred to in this Agreement individually as a “Party” and collectively as the “Parties.” In consideration of the mutual promises contained herein and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, the Parties agree:

ol.li: Title. Subject to the terms of this Agreement, upon the execution of this Agreement and Beneficiary’s acceptance of possession and ownership of the personal property described in Appendix A (the “Property”) and Donor hereby grants, transfers, assigns and delivers all right, title, and interest of any kind it may have in and to the Property to Beneficiary.

Acceptance. Beneficiary agrees that upon receipt of the Property, that Donor’s liability for conveyance of the Property will cease, and all risk of loss or damage to the Property will pass, to the Beneficiary, upon Donor making the Property available to Beneficiary as of the effective date of this Agreement, regardless of the actual date Beneficiary takes actual possession of the Property. Property held by Donor after the agreed upon delivery/pick-up date will be at Beneficiary’s risk and expense. Decommission Management Services Provider is responsible for packing, loading and transportation of the Property and any expenses as a result thereof including, but not limited to packing, packaging, loading, transportation, export, customs, and insurance costs.
Package Deal Offer. The Property will be accepted by Beneficiary as “all-inclusive” and will not be accepted separately.

Good and Marketable Title. Donor affirms that as of the Effective Date, (i) it has good and marketable title to the Property, and the unconditional right and authority to sell and deliver the same to Beneficiary, and (ii) the Property is free and clear of all leases, liens or other financial security interests or claims of ownership.

Warranty. COMPANY ACCEPTS THE PROPERTY “AS IS, WHERE IS, WITH ALL FAULTS,” WITHOUT ANY EXPRESS, IMPLIED OR STATUTORY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND AS TO THE CONDITION OF THE PROPERTY, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR MERCHANTABILITY. THE COMPANY ACKNOWLEDGES THAT IT HAS SELECTED THE PROPERTY BASED ON ITS OWN INSPECTION AND DUE DILIGENCE, AND WAS PROVIDED THE OPPORTUNITY TO HAVE PROPERTY INSPECTED FOR ANY LATENT DEFECTS. COMPANY EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ANY RELIANCE UPON ORAL REPRESENTATIONS OR STATEMENTS MADE BY WELLS FARGO NOT REFLECTED IN THIS AGREEMENT.

Indemnity. Subject to Donor’s affirmation in Section 6 above, Beneficiary hereby releases, and agrees to indemnify and hold harmless, Donor, its parent corporation and affiliates and each of their respective employees, directors, contractors, agents, successors and assigns, from and against any and all liability, cost and expense of any kind (including attorneys’ fees) arising directly or indirectly out of this Agreement or any claims, actions or proceedings resulting from the Beneficiary's use or disposition of the Property.
Assignment. Beneficiary and Donor each warrant and represent that the undersigned individuals have the legal capacity to bind their respective entity to this Agreement.

Assignment. Beneficiary will not assign any of its rights or delegate any of its duties under this Agreement without the prior written consent of Donor, which consent will not be unreasonably withheld. Any unauthorized Beneficiary assignment or delegation will be null and void. Beneficiary will not be relieved of any of its obligations hereunder as a result of any assignment of this Agreement. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement will be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the Parties’ successors and assigns. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Beneficiary is free to use or dispose of the Property as it sees fit once full payment has been received by Donor, as set forth above.

Modification and Waiver. No modification of this Agreement is effective unless signed by Beneficiary and Donor, and no waiver of any breach of this Agreement will be effective unless in writing and signed by an authorized representative of the non-breaching Party.

Interpretation. Each Party acknowledges that it had the opportunity to read and review this Agreement with counsel, and that this Agreement has been the subject of active and complete negotiations. This Agreement will not be construed against the Party preparing it, but will be construed as if all the Parties jointly prepared the Agreement, and any uncertainty or ambiguity will not be interpreted against any one Party. Section headings are provided for convenience only and are not to be used to construe or interpret this Agreement.

Governing Law. This Agreement will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State in which the Property is located, excluding any applicable conflicts or choice of law provisions.

Remedies Upon Default. In the event of breach by either Party of this Agreement, the non-breaching Party will be entitled to exercise any and all rights and remedies available to it at law or in equity, whether concurrently or separately, and the exercise of one remedy will not be deemed either an election of such remedy or a preclusion of the right to exercise any other remedy.

Entire Understanding. This Agreement constitutes the exclusive and entire agreement between the Parties with respect to the Property, and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous agreements, negotiations, representations and proposals of any kind, whether written or oral, either express or implied, relating to this subject matter. Neither Party will be bound nor liable to the other Party for any representation, promise or inducement made by any agent or person representing the other Party that is not embodied in this Agreement.

template.p: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Beneficiary and Donor, by the signatures of their duly-authorized representatives below, intending to be legally bound, agree to all of the provisions of this Agreement.
